title: Why You're Never Gonna Beat the Stock Market
subtitle: Understand the challenges of market timing and the benefits of a simple investment strategy.
content:
Why You're Never Gonna Beat the Stock Market

Here is exactly why you’re never gonna beat the stock market.

1. The Market Isn't Logical

The market isn’t logical. It’s a moody, unpredictable ding-dong, and it’s already six months ahead of you and your gut feeling.

2. Competing with the Pros

You’re competing with hedge funds run by over-caffeinated MIT grads who haven’t seen daylight since 2013.

3. Behavioral Biases

Your brain is wired to panic, chase trends, and buy high because some guru on TikTok told you you’re missing out. You’re not beating it; you’re feeding it for the smart money to eat.

4. Buy the Index

So buy the index and come join me for a walk in Vermont.

Conclusion

If any of this is helpful, check out my new podcast, Your Money Guide, on the Side, by clicking the link in my bio.
